Summary: black triangle ufo with resemblance of a stealth fighter, no sound at all but white blinking lights on tail, using stealth and the lights made no sence
trends: There have been no other sightings in Oranjestad
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsback yard, over head passing black triangle ufo. cloudy conditions, the grey black color of the ufo made the whole thing blend in with the clouds. slow straight line flight.feelings reaction and action none. lost sight as view got blocked by house.
